desc: A bug found in the mineral mountains. It makes its nest with silver.

dictionary.lore: A bug that makes its nest out of silver found in the mineral mountains. It is very swift and resembles a shooting star flying in the dark forests, hence its name. Itâ€™s said that its body is made of magic, which reduces to dust when it dies. It is tricky to preserve and is rarely captured in a perfect state.

name: Comet Bug
